name: Dread Examiner
movement: walk 30 ft., fly 30 ft., swim 30 ft.
description: The Dread Examiner is a large, intimidating aberration known for its exceptional intelligence and charisma. It appears disjointed yet powerful, capable of manipulating its form and utilizing potent psychic abilities.
memorable: Its blend of powerful spellcasting and physical attacks, along with abilities like Psychic Surge and truesight, make it an unforgettable encounter for adventurers.
goals: The Dread Examiner seeks to dominate its surroundings and control the minds of others through manipulation and psychic prowess.
relations: It may be encountered alongside other aberrations or beings with psychic abilities, possibly serving as a leader or overseer.
environment: Typically found in places steeped in magic or aberration-infested areas.
strengths: Immunities to various conditions and nonmagical damage types, powerful psychic abilities, and exceptional spellcasting.
weaknesses: Limited effectiveness against magical attacks despite its resistance.
attacks: Can unleash multiple powerful Force Swipe or Force Blast attacks, dealing force damage while also pushing or knocking opponents prone.
most_powerful_ability: Psychic Surge, which deals psychic damage and imposes disadvantage on nearby foes' next actions.
senses: Truesight up to 120 feet allows it to see through darkness and perceive creatures accurately.
skills: Boasts a high perception skill, enhancing its awareness of surroundings.
additional_information: Legendary Resistance allows it to succeed on failed saves three times per day.
Ability to teleport up to 120 feet as a legendary action.
Can sense magic within 120 feet at will without being magical itself.
Maintains cohesion and shape, immune to effects altering its form.
spellcasting: Can cast various psionic spells, including Dispel Magic, Telekinesis, and True Polymorph, with a Charisma-based DC of 22.
test_queries: intelligent psychic monster with powerful spells
aberration that can teleport and manipulate
manipulative creature with truesight and psychic powers
large creature immune to nonmagical damage
Dread Examiner powerful spellcaster and attacker
